place: Via della Barriera Vecchia 32, III, Trieste (Austria)
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Palmer Pray excuse me for my delay in acknowledging receipt of The Man for Galwayâ€”for which I thank you. Perhaps this card may interest you. Smareglia (who lives beside me) is held by many to be the most original of the living Italian musicians. Wishing you good fortune and a merry Christmas Very sincerely yours James Joyce
